workshoptitle: Load and Analyze Your Data with Autonomous Database

tutorials.title: Lab 1: Provision an Analytics Cloud Instance
tutorials.description: Provision Oracle Analytics Cloud. You will use this instance when creating dashboards at the end of this workshop.

tutorials.title: Lab 3: Load Data from Public Object Storage Buckets
tutorials.description: Load customer contact, movie genre and pizza location data into ADB from public object storage buckets using the Database Actions tools

tutorials.title: Lab 4: Load Local and Private Object Storage Data
tutorials.description: Load additional customer details into ADB from local files and private object storage buckets using the Database Actions tools

tutorials.title: Lab 5: Access and Load Partitioned Object Storage Data
tutorials.description: Examine the power of partitioning for querying and loading customer sales data sourced from object storage

tutorials.title: Lab 5: Load and Analyze JSON Data
tutorials.description: Load JSON collections about movies using the DBMS_CLOUD package and analyze that data using SQL

tutorials.title: Lab 6: Load and Analyze the News from REST Endpoints
tutorials.description: Load news and analyze the sentiment about actors from the newsapi.org

tutorials.title: Lab 7: Develop Self-Service Analytics Cloud Dashboards
tutorials.description: Use Analytics Cloud for interactive dashboards

tutorials.title: Need Help?
tutorials.description: Solutions to Common Problems and Directions for Receiving Live Help
